website_summaries.verdict: The Sony NSZ-GS7 has sleek hardware and an innovative remote, but it's hampered by the still too-limited and frustrating Google TV software.
pros: The Sony NSZ-GS7 has a vastly improved, double-sided remote for Google TV, with a large touch pad and a full keyboard
It's a small, stylish box and the only current set-top box that supports Google TV
cons: The Google TV software continues to disappoint
There aren't dedicated apps for major streaming services like Amazon Instant, Hulu Plus, and MLB.TV, nor is Google's own movie rental service supported
Major content providers like ABC, CBS, NBC, Fox, Comedy Central, and MTV still block Google TV's software from streaming browser-based video
And the software is still buggy and difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted, but has now dropped in value to that of a doorstop, should it prove heavy enough to act as one. Sony has dropped all support for the Google TV, the Youtube App can not be updated beyond the current one that is no longer supported so no videos are displayed or can be played. Everything crashes constantly because the apps are outdated but there are no updates. All you can do now is maybe browse the Internet which gets hindersome because you have to continually click on "Force Close" when the random background outdated app crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Lance B. Linton

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase it! No longer supported by Googles Play ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't Purchase it! No longer supported by Googles Play Store. Will not download any apps, if you ever reset to Factory reset. Doing so will remove your box identification from Googles Play Store "white list". Google is pushing everyone into their "new" Andriod TV Lolly Pop... This is so they can profit and make in roads into the 3% transaction fees credit card markets, with their new touch phone purchasing app. Buyer Be Ware!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Get a Roku
customer_reviews.text: Get a Roku. This box is practically useless and needs constant rebooting to factory default. Its a pain. I don't lime leaving bad reviews but you would think Google would make a quality product. Its not. And Google limits your access to many good apps. Its tiring trying to figure how to download apps that they restrict from their system, I think it's ridiculous that I can't watch Hulu . Google needs major improvements with this expensive useless box.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: This Sony internet player is worthless,  it can not play videos from the internet websites anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product, this item is basically worthless, you can not view video from the internet because FLASH player plug in is not supported by adobe anymore. Last Google software update for this unit was sometime in November 2013. Google TV technical support is a joke, they can not help you at all. Do not waste your money , return this internet player right away and get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE     A. LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: best of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered in over a dozen internet TV streaming boxes. The majority do not work at all. The better ones were very difficult to run. The Sony box is not perfect, though it is useable and provides a near endless supply of free internet TV when adding into the apts storage. This is still an evolving technology. Sony has done a fine job and the remote is absolutely outstanding. Here are a few streaming sites that work well. Please note that a delay upwards to 5 minutes may be needed before enlargening the picture: choose and watch, Fomny watch free live TV, Mobile watch live TV, Project Free TV, and other web sites.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and feel of the remote.Box so far is working well.The front of the remote works good,all the bottons are easy to press and reaction time for the channels turning is good. The back of the remote has what looks like a small keyboard like on the computer.I have not been able to get it to work.Nothing happens when I push the bottons.Maybe I'm doing something wrong.I will read the instructions again and see if I can fix the problem first before I get intouch with the company.I hope it is a easy fix,I really like this!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: I needed a media player that would work with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a media player that would work with my SlingBox and this was the one that offered the most capabilities. Surprisingly, it had far more capabilities than I initially expected. It seems to have every streaming service imaginably possible, and IR blaster with the Bluetooth remote gave me control over the old Denon receiver I lost the remote for. The keyboard and track pad are surprisingly intuitive and make browsing the web a snap. For when you want to browse the web and read your email on the biggest screen you can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Sarchet

customer_reviews.title: Ok Google Tv Device, but I have to ask - Do Sony engineers get paid by the button?
customer_reviews.text: I <3 my Sony google tv with Blu-Ray player. So I figured this would be about the same device sans the Blu-Ray player. And for the most part it is. Except for the remote. Several dozen nondescript buttons with no backlighting (there is some backlighting on the keyboard flip side), make it nearly impossible to use unless sitting under a lamp. I suppose with heavy use I may eventually develop some sort of muscle memory, but I usually just have to reach for my phone and control it using the GoogleTV app.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great, but sadly, abandoned by Sony.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little streamer for me for a long time now, only MAJOR issue is, Sony *completely* abandoned it. No more software updates, even though they're BAAADLY needed. I have no idea why they just jumped ship on this device, since it mostly works great, and with an update to the latest version of Android, plus a few other bug fixes and tweaks, it would still be a top notch device in my opinion, and I've used all flavors of Roku's, Apple TV, and Chromecast.
customer_reviews.author: GeekDrop[.]com

customer_reviews.title: it worked for a while...
customer_reviews.text: it worked for a while... now it just stopped and not even the technical service was helpful, can't even reset the bloody thing UPDATE: Sept 1, 2015 the only good app working here was Amazon and now this is gone, the streaming quality is not worth it, I'm really gonna miss the remote (the keyboard mostly). I hoped I could use it to surf the net too but its capacities are too limited and there isn't much that can be done. Glad I have to my Apple TV and Xbox
customer_reviews.author: sambuca1970

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a fantastic product. I use the Internet Player with my DirecTV service and it works exactly as described. Setup can be a bit difficult, with some quirks to work though. But once it's running, the Google TV is wonderful. I use Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, and now occasionally the Google Play store. All work well, and the ability to search across all sources, including DirecTV and find the best place to get the content I want is fantastic. A benefit I didn't fully expect is the ability to play Google Music on my home theater system. The Google TV replaces my iPod dock as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Myers

customer_reviews.title: Stay awar
customer_reviews.text: My old faithful Sony Google TV box is regressing (broken Youtube, Amazon stopped working, etc) so I order this one to try. Just the same clunkiness so sent it back. I am yet to find a good quality TV buddy box (with HDMI input for Tivo and a remote control that controls also the TV, DVR and audio system).
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first internet streaming device and I have to say I like it. It was easy to hook up and even through the remote has a lot of functions, it is easy to use. I tried Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and videos straight from websites without any problems. The only things I can bring up that I would say could be improved on is the forward and reverse functions and the unit does get pretty hot. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Greg

customer_reviews.title: BEST MEDIA PLAYER ON THE MARKET!
customer_reviews.text: Sony's Google TV plus Plex is a pirates's dream! To my knowledge this is the only plex client (besides a mac mini) that can pass through surround sound formats while streaming movies through plex! I would definitely recommend this to someone looking to stream movies from there desktop computer to to a tv somewhere in their home! It is also very convenient that it integrates right into your TV provider box, so one doesn't have to constantly be changing inputs! Amazing product! BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Great with flaws
customer_reviews.text: It's great for doing what I wanted but the chrome browser is horrible without an ad blocker. Google needs to stop making money off of what we search and let us use an ad blocker! Other than that it does exactly what I wanted. It plays flash a little slow but videos play well and every site I threw at it worked great. I just need an option to play grooveshark in the background and not have to leave the browser open all day just to listen to free music NOT using Pandora. ''''
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: awkward & over priced.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as an upgrade from my Roku box, but to my surprise it only offers HALF of the what the Basic Roku offers (no Hulu app... really?!) The box uses Google Chrome as it's Internet system, which is great... except they forgot to include a CLOSE function anywhere in the whole program (think about that for a second -- it's a big deal). I could go on and on but I won't. Don't buy it. It's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rain_dogg

customer_reviews.title: Need some help with HBO GO and Showtime Apps
customer_reviews.text: The box is easy to use and set-up and provides a clear picture better the Western Digital box I have. I like the mouse features of the remote and also the keyboard on the back of the remote. It took some time to find the Slingbox support I found it in Google Spotlight after contacting Sling Support. I have not found the apps for HBO GO and Showtime. Sony Support doesn't have any details.
customer_reviews.author: GrampaFarnham

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a year and we will never use satellite or cable again when you can watch all of your favorite tv shows and movies for free using the internet. Far better than Apple TV or Roku. Those just limit what you can watch for free. Google TV has full access to the internet so you can watch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Better than the logitech revue
customer_reviews.text: I've had the logitech revue for a couple years now and it was time to get something new and faster that runs android with google tv. This Sony google tv is so nice the remote is so convenient, it has a track pad on one side with a full keyboard on the other and it works great. The best part is it replaces your tv, audio receiver, and satellite remote and the range is awesome. And the apps are good but defiantly needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: It's A Sony!
customer_reviews.text: I am one who still believes that Sony has some of the best electronic devices out there. This Internet Player is a good example. It's easy to setup, easy to use, and it updates itself automatically if it's networked. Of course the price is a little higher than similar products, but then again, you get what you pay for. (The Roku was a cheap piece of junk, as was the NetGear device.)
customer_reviews.author: C. Reinders II

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was more flexible in terms of the apps I can load and also was more stable against freezing and having to clear the app memory every now and then. This works great if you are looking for a computer attached to your TV to make it run a variety of things. Our daily toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashu

customer_reviews.title: Black screen for $200.
customer_reviews.text: Just received a new Sony NSZ-GS7 from Amazon. Got it up and running after about an hour and watched part of a movie. Left it on overnight. Dead on arrival in the morning. No video. Tried the factory reset. Still nothing. Packing it up and shipping it back for a refund. Maybe I just got a bad one. Is quality control dead at Sony?
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Overheats / stops working randomly
customer_reviews.text: After approximately 6 months of use, product stopped working sporadically. The problem became more severe afterward. I returned it to Sony for repair or replacement just before the end of the manufacturer warranty but Sony returned a device with the same issue! I threw it away, as it was unusable. I contacted Sony about this "repair" but Sony did not bother to respond. $200 wasted. I ended up buying a Roku instead, which works very well (I do miss the web browser though).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Google TV is not good
customer_reviews.text: Sony hardware is weak to handle Google TV Google TV itself is not good I like the remote but in general the design is flawed. Many missing functions for TV watching: 1- cannot turn TV + AVR + Cable 2- Cannot go back to last show 3- PIP is useless Just disappointmented
customer_reviews.author: S. Elias

customer_reviews.title: Model is getting phased out
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product, but recently learnt that Google is stopping to support Youtube on this model. Phasing-out this model. And Sony customer service does not respond properly for your calls. They wont even let you know about Google is stopping the support.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Chimakurthy

customer_reviews.title: Which is frustrating because it's like completely starting over with a new device
customer_reviews.text: Dropped support for hbo go, does not hold stable wireless connections, has to be reset and rebooted every so often in order to stream online video services. Which is frustrating because it's like completely starting over with a new device. Ido recommend it due to the unreliable service and incompetence of having to reset it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: After seeing one of these players at my sons home, I had to purchase it. This is great for someone who doesn't own a "Smart" tv with built in apps. I had recently purchase a 3-D TV and had realized it had the ability to do the same thing as the Player, but my daughter loves in with her tv set (Not Smart Tv).
customer_reviews.author: T. Shiver

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Don't really like this it seems to always need to be rebooted forgets passwords kind of a waste good idea If it worked
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Best gtv box out
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried the costar and this blows it out of the water. By far way better. The remote works great and has a lighted keyboard. if you want a gtv box pay more and get this one. Get the logitech keyboard and you be happy! Tried the new hisense pulse and nothings changed Sony is the best. Dont get the hisense its terrible.
customer_reviews.author: rlivin

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Plex media server and stream movies from my computer to my TV via the Sony NSZ-GS7. Its fast, and powerful and extremely useful for finding kids shows on youtube or hulu in a crunch. If your looking for a highly customizeable media player for your tv, this would be a good choice :)
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fat fingers here
customer_reviews.text: I am getting to learn my way around this product and so far it has some impressive features. I do have struggle with the Google Chrome when trying to use the touch pad for input. It just doesn't seem to work, at all. Once I learn more, or some updates come out I might re-visit this review. It's OK.
customer_reviews.author: David Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! I had the Sony internet TV but it was stolen when my home was Burglarized (jerks!), but using this device I was able to set up my Flat screen TV just as my internet TV was set up. I can't watch HULU on it BUT it has a USB Micro input and I'm able to connect my kindle fire to it and watch Hulu on the "big Screen". I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Added Amazon HD video with 3/15/13 Update
customer_reviews.text: Setup took about an hour, but was pretty easy. The remote is great and was easily able to control my LG TV and decades old Kenwood audio receiver. Updated to Google TV 3 on 3/15/2013. It now has an Amazon Instant Video App with HD Video, including free Amazon Prime Videos.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: great device to enhance TV experience
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the Logitech Revue to this item simply because i like the mini keyboard and seems to be faster than the Revue. I like Google TV (unlike the rest of the world) and this device provides that experience. I would recommend this to anyone tired of the old cable-box layout and better TV experience, and also would like to have a smart TV without buying a new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the non-smart TV
customer_reviews.text: - Have been using this for more than a month - Have been hanging up several times while using it. Had to reboot - Can't compare with other Google TV manufacturers since have not used one other than this. - Had made the decision based on the earlier reviews that this is better - Works as expected with hang ups that require reboots as mentioned earlier. - Think this is one of the better options when compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata Adimatyam

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The box had issues since the beginning, would get stuck every 5 minutes, but I thought maybe it's because it is new and it needs some time to "warm up". After a month it's just stopped working completely. Wanted to return it, but it said on my account that I could no longer return the item. Will never buy it again from Amazon, better pay $$ extra and buy it at Best Buy, so at least you can return it longer or get better customer service. What I suppose to do now with that box I paid for $155?
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SMALL INTERNET TV DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters bedroom, so she can watch movies and such. It works good, but sometimes does not turn on properly and needs to reboot before it works. My daughter still likes it and uses it regularly though.
customer_reviews.author: daviggi

customer_reviews.title: net flix works overseeas with no problems unlike the wd live media player
customer_reviews.text: love this player so far ,wish it had some simple function buttons on the player it self ,other than that works great netflix works overseas was able to log on with my account no problems, amazon prime would not work , does get very hot when on the vents are at the bottom of player .it's worth it great buy.
customer_reviews.author: james lee shue ling

customer_reviews.title: this is a good product and it works with a full size wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product and it works with a full size wireless key board and mouse also i haven't had any problems with it at all.received it with in a few days after i ordered it. 5 star rating..
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this little device. I use it with Amazon, Netflix, Pandora and mainly Plex. The netflix app on GoogleTV is a little flaky when I initially try to open it. Other than that, I use it with my own Plex server and this little device is rock solid. Perfect for my needs at a vert affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M

customer_reviews.title: For TV lover's couch potatoes, movie watches this is ...
customer_reviews.text: For TV lover's couch potatoes ,movie watches this is a must have device.If people only knew what this device do,but that's okay because me and my friends do!
customer_reviews.author: tyrone taylor

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first this works great, then I had problems with the remote and ended up getting a XBOX much better
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t support YouTube
customer_reviews.text: Y’all are wack for no longer supporting YouTube. Now I gotta upgrade to an updated box. Not from y’all though
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to play online radio based on Beta but was not successful as Chrome version is different than 1 on Laptop.Remote and other functions are good but I was not going to use those as much as for Music.
customer_reviews.author: mid

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after a few days. I sent ...
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a few days. I sent it back to Amazon. That was a few years ago. Sony has probably worked out the bugs. I'm going to buy a Roku 4.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Limited. But does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat bummed that apps that work on my logitech review don't work on this. But it streams media well and does what it's supposed to . Plays well with my comcast box despite some reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Prisoner zero

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't trade it for anythig
customer_reviews.text: Love my player I own 3 of them... use it to browse the Web watch Netflix, Hulu and just about anything you could want. Love that the keyboard lights up
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sony Google TV
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up. It automatically detects the WiFi Network and prompts for the password. It is compact and having the keyboard on the back is a convenient feature. However, for us to stop the play there is no stop button. There is pause, fast forward and back but no stop. Having Netflix is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ranganathan

customer_reviews.title: this is so slow and qwerty keyboard
customer_reviews.text: sure you can access so many things but you gotta pay for them, and you gotta enter one letter at a time unless your an expert texter ,so it will get the web but boy o boy, don't plan on typing any long messages while pressing hard on every key in remote and well look at the youtube I would not recommend this to anyone and speaking of youtube if you expect to reach your account , forget it. It took me 20 minutes to figure it out , this was not worth it. thank God Amazon was good enough to accept return. minus the usual you pay shipping back. cool
customer_reviews.author: Just Em

customer_reviews.title: Product information out of date
customer_reviews.text: Beware - Google TV no longer supports Amazon Instant Video, even though this page continues to say that it does. This was the primary reason I purchased the device, but Amazon emailed me the following: "The Amazon Video app will no longer be available on the Google TV platform after September 14, 2015, which includes streaming devices from Sony, LG, Vizio, Hisense, ASUS, Netgear, and Hausbell. This means you won't be able to stream movies and TV shows directly from the Amazon Video app on your device."
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This Sony streaming video is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This Sony streaming video is amazingly simple to install. It is easy to surf the net, watch Netfix, and back to your cable channels. I added a wireless keyboard to mine to making typing easier, but the keyboard on the remote does the job - just slower typing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a broken Sony box but alas it can't access hulu. My older model got hulu and you tube. My main use for it is to view hulu without tying up my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: This product is a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have had this product it keeps shutting off, it gets overheated even when its off and when turning the tv on it has a black picture but sound so I have to keep unplugging it. I have called Sony several times and they just keep apologizing but this is not going to make this product work. If its only compatible with Sony tv's it should specify this because Sony did ask me what type of HDTV I had and when I told them it wasnt a Sony they thought that might have something to do with its malfunctioning. I wont buy from Sony again this sort of product because its a waste of money and my time!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I want some one else to use it for the next time you should get one also
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it can be used for searching for a idea from Google search and you can stream movies from Google play
customer_reviews.author: pamela kuhlow

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice and portable system. With my 50" LED TV works awesome. Great alternative when you want to surf web but don't want to use computer. I am very impressed and recommend if you looking smart TV just in prince range.
customer_reviews.author: SherGill

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: very good this if this is the best you could buy to have internet on your TV and I am very pleased with the price and the picture quality of this tv google but they recommend you buy it for this product is very safe
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awsome! My 4 year old learned how to use it himself for netflx cartoons. It basically turns your TV into a Smart TV and you can do things like surf the Web.
customer_reviews.author: Bubballoso

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than expected there were a few hickups when I set up the device. However, after few days this device works as designed. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described
customer_reviews.text: Item died after 2+ months. Last 2 we bought new lasted 2 years each with heavy daily use. Paid 80% of what we used to pay for less than 10% of the product. Item was not in good shape and we are not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Devlin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: unit operation is just like my old one bought in 2012
customer_reviews.text: Unit looks new except box; unit operation is just like my old one bought in 2012; remote also looks new like no one ever uses it before;
customer_reviews.author: Tthai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to use for slingbox app!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this system. I bought it specially to use at my vacation home to access my slingbox, that is in my primary house. The slingbox app is in the google spotlight section. I had it hooked up to the wifi network and produced an amazingly clear picture in hd just as if I was watching my tv at home. I would highly recommend this Sony box!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal L,

customer_reviews.title: This product is dead.
customer_reviews.text: Worst electronics purchase ever. Hardware and software are both buggy. Doesn't matter because Google TV is being replaced by Android TV soon anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Gartman

customer_reviews.title: Not the ultimate answer to TV streaming
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a brilliant idea but as I discovered when I got it hooked up that you cannot watch everything you want. Certain networks like CBS and ABC will not let you stream their shows to this device. It's useful if you want to browse the web and so forth but I mainly wanted it to watch streaming TV shows without having to use my computer. It's a good product but even Sony, on their support site, admits that not everything that is streaming can be seen on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wonder of modern technology.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the device, installed it, and it worked fine, except, I have the Sony surround sound and it is in the loop as well. I still haven't figured out how to get audio for the channels I'm watching. Haven't given up yet... If I can get the audio out it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Only problem is app support
customer_reviews.text: Great system and remote, But apps fall short. Netflix app doesn't update through play store so app is really dated and it only updates if you're lucky. No native apps for amazon prime or hulu. NO HBO GO support. However Plex is included with this and it is great fro playing local media.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: The best Google TV
customer_reviews.text: Getting timely automatic update. Function smoothly. Getting all the internet functions on the big screen. Price could be lower. NO free upgrade to the new voice recognized remote. With such a price, SONY should upgrade for free.
customer_reviews.author: WWK

customer_reviews.title: Google TV
customer_reviews.text: So far my Google TV is fast, easy, and convenient to use. It has good quality and a good user interface with a versatile remote. It links to your Google account for easy syncs and the apps from the play store are a nice feature for the product. I would recommend watching other review videos on YouTube - that's how I got info about it. Currently its still pretty new to me.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Schnittgen

customer_reviews.title: Trying to save some money ended up being a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Junk. That's what I get for buying a refurbished unit I guess. Trying to save some money ended up being a waste of money. Unit is dead and basically sat in the room unused for months. Can't even get the unit to turn on. No lights nothing. Last thing I would ever buy used on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Peterkin

customer_reviews.title: No Need for Cable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy set up, hundreds of apps, channels, music, easily accessible. Easy internet streaming, you can check your email and upload videos and pictures and watch on your big screen. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenc17

customer_reviews.title: A fan
customer_reviews.text: We like Google TV a lot but our old Logitech unit quit. Hopefully this Sony will last longer, and it does have a smoother system in place.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Biehl

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected so let me tell you what this device really is, it's a mobile phone internet browser that you plug into your tv. I wish this would have been more clear as I would have just saved a little more money and bought a cheap laptop. The best part about this is if you have netflix. Also had to get a $100 SONY antenna to make it work so the whole thing cost me about $250. Not made at the company just disappointed in myself for not looking at what you really get when I ordered it. The coolest thing is the remote it's pretty slick.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Better than win 7 mini PC
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I can control my cable box and search for content across all internet & cable channels. Performance is very good versus a mini PC that ran win7 on an Intel Atom. The user interface is definitely more suited for the TV format than win7. Flash too so that you can watch internet content from websites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony NSZ-GS7
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. I actually have two of them. I found it very easy to setup. I have one on a wired and one wireless. I enjoy the tv and movie feature where I can see what is playing on the tv at the time and am able to tune to it with one click. I do wish that more apps were available for it, hence the four star review. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tomcdman

customer_reviews.title: Google TV... Improved
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of a Logitech Revue let me say I'm very happy with this product. It's not much more different than the Revue except that this thing works. Everything is more responsive. Even Chrome works well. Sites do not crash. The ability to watch movies and tv from the Google Play store is a welcomed bonus. The keyboard/controller is something to get familiar with. But once you spend a day with it you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Player can be added to any TV gives great access to various internet services easy set up and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Knabenshue

customer_reviews.title: Ho hum nothing to really like about it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a fun novelty but did not distinguish itself from other set top boxes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that I've done for myself in a very long time. I can view what I want to watch and not just what my local cable company offers me! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bon-marie

customer_reviews.title: Best entertainment money can buy.( BUY SONY)
customer_reviews.text: so easy to setup and user friendly. does everything i expected. I have six products from sony and will not consider any other name in entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Watson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: amazon prime video do not work and more some application.
customer_reviews.author: jdcomando7

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome. Buy it now. Seriously. If you are an android user, this is for you. Ditch your cable, save money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... they return half of the money and I wasn't happy for
customer_reviews.text: it didn't work properly after few months stop working and they return half of the money and I wasn't happy for it
customer_reviews.author: ayub saeed

customer_reviews.title: i can not connect to the hangout.
customer_reviews.text: i like the item but it does not do what bought it for. i would like to return the item but i do not think that i have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Pena

customer_reviews.title: Google TV
customer_reviews.text: The remote takes a little time to get used to but once you work out you have to press hard on the "mouse" pad (to act as a left mouse button)it is great. Google seem to limit a lot of available android apps on this and there is no HULU PLUS which is really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: After going through a bunch of review, I was initially scared of buying this product. But this product has surpassed my expectation and basically functions exactly as advertised. The only reason I am not giving it five stars, there are not many free channels available, yet. Technology exists but content providers still fear providing the content online fearing the content distributors like Comcast, Time Warner, etc who would obviously would cut them out. Buy this and cut the cord, it is only a matter of years when all the channels would be available live. But until then, there are pre-recorded videos, and ofcourse, youtube, netflix and amazon. There are also couple of new comers of unknown reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev Nair

customer_reviews.title: No DTS Audio - No DLNA support
customer_reviews.text: I would give this device a 5 stars if it would support DLNA and mainly DTS audio for movies. The device comes with Plex client installed which could take care of streaming content but it does require a server program to run on your computer. The media player needs to support DLNA. There is no DTS , DTS-MA support for videos so any movie with a mix of DTS and AC3 tracks will only allow you to have AC3 audio and nothing if the movie is DTS only... The DTS thing is probably a licensing issue but if sony can include it in their bluray player they should be able to do the same in this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD INTERNET BROWSER
customer_reviews.text: I AM HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT BUT HAVENT BEEN ABLE TO DOWNLOAD INSTALL JAVA ....HELP !!! OTHER THAN THAT IT DOES EVERYTHING A COMPUTER CAN DO AND AT GOOD SPEED...
customer_reviews.author: DIEGO PORRAS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: After the last two updates here in December, no more crashes or reboots. The device works perfectly now, fast and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Schandorsky

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to play youtube on my TV and I got just that using chrome.Good controller. Has a LOT of keys but is fun to use. Lot's of things that can be improved like the Youtube app. it's not as user friendly as the android 4.0 one that I am used to on my phone..
customer_reviews.author: Manmeet

customer_reviews.title: Love the Concept but two have broken down.
customer_reviews.text: The control is better that the Visio CoStar which I bought and gave to my sister but it is hard if not impossible to read in the dark. Otherwise a great control. Update: The first one I bought when bad and so did the second one. I bought the extended warranty from Sony. At this point I don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: i both two of them. One still is working ...
customer_reviews.text: i both two of them.One still is working,another is not.Remote control not working.I changed batteries,but is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Daiva

customer_reviews.title: a MEDIA powerhouse...
customer_reviews.text: For those that DONT have a PS3 or an xbox 360... This unit is a PERFECT buy... people are always amazed at how i control my tv from so many different spots!!! The remote, my laptop or my cell phone... the software is now faster and easier to navigate, and they finally added a backlight on the remote!!! GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: SupaDave

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have all Android apps available...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but my only disappointment was that you can't download the Amazon MP3 app... you can still play your Amazon cloud music from the web browser, but the app is easier and can play in background while still using the browser. The Amazon Prime Video app is great, but Google I think blocked all other Amazon apps. But overall very happy addition to my AV system....
customer_reviews.author: VB Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Google TV
customer_reviews.text: This item freezes up, the sound sometimes does not come on with out restarting, after 2 weeks the entire system had to reset to factory defaults and all items redownloaded. But it does have nice features
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I love the remote/keyword
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I love the remote/keyword. I'm very happy with it. I stream anything I want at the astonishing speed of 150mbps.
customer_reviews.author: AntonioAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lag when switching between apps
customer_reviews.text: Lag when switching between apps, some times apps crashes and we have to restart the device not just shutdown and start but to remove off the power plug. It will not detect the HDDs as mentioned in the specs.
customer_reviews.author: sunil yarragogu

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Watch a lot of things with that and it's easy to use. Check the website and download many apps. It's pictures are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Teyemensah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome box, love everything about it, minor issue with not having enough AV selections for the remote to program all my devices on it, but that's because I have way to much stuff to program
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't, just dont.
customer_reviews.text: Refuses to connect over hard line even if with DHCP disabled. Refuses to accept router as NTS so if you ever unplug the damn thing you are going to have to set the time and date manually before it will connect over wifi again. This thing also gets hot, like what the hell is going on in there hot, even when not in use. When it freezes you have to do a hard reboot which means you get to enter the time and date again.
customer_reviews.author: Basilthree

customer_reviews.title: this set remains very hot
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I don't understand why this set Sony Internet Player with Google TV remains very, very hot. With the answer, the Sony.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO SERGIO FERNANDES

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine from November 2012 until Febuary 2017 but then.......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine in November of 2012 and used it quite often. Recently it stopped transferring my cable signal. I changed out the HDMI cable and even changed out the cable box, but it just no longer will work from my cable box. although it works as usual from its own box to my tv just fine. Sad! I liked it but will be looking for something new.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

product_meta.title: Sony NSZ-GS7 Internet Player with Google TV (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Internet Streaming - H.264, 3G2, 3GP, MPEG-4, AVI, MKV, MOV, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, M2T, M2TS, ... - AAC-LC, HE-AAC, M4A, WAV, MP3, WMA, ASF - BMP, JPEG, GIF, MPO, PNG - Ethernet - HDMI - USB

FROM THE MANUFACTURER






What's on TV? That's completely up to you. With all-new voice recognition software6, just say what you want to find for movies, TV shows, websites and more. Watch YouTube videos from your smartphone on your TV with ease while accessing new apps like Amazon Instant Video from Google Play. One box, unlimited entertainment. Technology Google TV with built-in
voice search The search power of Google is now built right into your TV. Looking for highlights of your favorite team or movies starring a certain actor? Just speak6 or type in whatever you’re in the mood for and enjoy cross-search results from your cable provider, the Internet, apps and even select Dish DVR1 systems. It's all there. Instantly. Best of all, Google TV uses your existing cable or satellite service, so you don’t even have to switch inputs to use it. Browse the web on the big screen

Experience your favorite websites on a grand scale with the built-in Google Chrome browser designed for speed, simplicity and efficiency. And because it features a Flash Media Player, you can view Flash-based video sites for endless video content and engaging interactivity. Plus, you’ll always have the most up-to-date software with automatic updates. More apps, more choices

A host of made-for-TV apps like Netflix, Pandora, Amazon Instant Video, and YouTube come pre-installed right out of the box. Want more? Download an endless variety of apps from the Google Play store. You’ll find tons of apps just like the ones on your smartphone perfect for watching videos, listening to music, playing games, staying on top of the news and social networking. PrimeTime – a guide that works for you Last year, Google TV added the TV & Movies app to help you browse 100,000+ movies and TV episodes. Now called PrimeTime, the app makes it even easier to find your favorite content. Easily access PrimeTime anywhere on Google TV and browse for something new while you watch. Flip through the best programs on live TV quickly, access your favorite channels, see which shows you recently watched, and get customized suggestions based on what you enjoy. YouTube – now easier to watch on Google TV Sony and Google are making it easier and faster to watch YouTube on your TV. With the updated YouTube app, one button is all it takes to pair your Android smartphone or tablet to start playing YouTube videos from your device on your TV. Remote control like no other

You've never seen a remote quite like this. With a large touchpad on one side and a full keyboard on the other, it's optimized for ease of use. The clickable touchpad works just like the one on your laptop, with one-handed operation plus pinch-and-pull for zoom control. Flip it over and you'll find a backlit QWERTY keyboard. There's also a 3-Axis motion sensor for gaming. 
Additional Features Explore the full range of features and options below. 
Google TV
Now the searching power of Google is built right into your TV. Craving some highlights from your team or movies starring your favorite actor? Just type it in and enjoy cross-search results from the internet,2 apps and even select Dish DVR1. It's all there, instantly. Best of all, Google TV is already connected to your cable or satellite service, so you do not have to switch inputs to use it.

Google Play Store
There's always something on. Download apps directly to your TV from the ever-expanding Google Play Store.2 Choose from classics like Netflix, Pandora and YouTube or expand your horizons with apps such as Crunchyroll, Redux, Google Play Music, Plex, and Qello. In addition to video and music apps, you can download games, social networking and news apps just like the ones on your smartphone. Very convenient.

Innovative Remote Control
You've never seen a universal remote quite like this.4 The clickable touchpad works just like the one on your laptop, featuring one-handed operation and multi-touch pinch-and-pull for zoom control. There's also a 3-Axis motion sensor for gaming. Flip it over and you'll find a backlit QWERTY keyboard that makes it easy to type at night. And don't worry, it knows which way is facing up so you won't accidentally hit keys on the other side. 

Chrome Browser
Experience your favorite websites on a grand scale with the built-in Google Chrome browser that is built for speed, simplicity and efficiency. And because it features a Flash Media Player, Flash-based video sites open doors to endless video content and engaging interactivity2. Auto updates ensure added security.



Up to $45 in digital movies
Start your digital movie collection today with up to $45 in feature films on Google Play. Use the redemption codes inside to add 3 movies to your Google Play movie library. You can watch your movies unlimited times with Google TV and anywhere else you can access Google Play on the web. Select your 3 choices from the 15 available movies. Full offer details at www.sony.com/PlayMovieOffer3.

Socialife for Google TV
Facebook and Twitter posts are all in one place on your TV. The Socialife app also optimizes viewing of photo and video posts for TV-sized screens.

TV & Movies App
The cable guide has evolved…again – The TV & Movies App is the easiest way to find and watch the best entertainment available. Browse everything that’s playing right now, whether it’s on live TV or available through online services like Netflix2. You’ll quickly find your favorite TV shows and movies, And also get customized recommendations to explore new shows.

Built-in Wireless
No network cables necessary. Maximize your entertainment while reducing cable clutter and wirelessly stream beautiful, HD video straight from the internet or your home network2. Or you can use a wired connection if you choose. It's all seamless, and it's all built-in.

Updateable Google TV Platform
Technology moves fast, and you want to stay up to date. That's why the Internet Player features automatic updates that keep your software current. When new features are added or existing ones are tweaked, you'll get an on-screen notification to get the latest update with one touch.



Sony Entertainment Network
Welcome to the endless entertainment of the Sony Entertainment Network, where the Video and Music Unlimited services offer thousands of movies and music tracks from every major studio in an instant2.

Media Remote App
Transform your iPhone, Android phone or tablet into a versatile remote control with a full QWERTY keyboard. Just download the free Media Remote app if you’re looking for one less remote on the coffee table. The app also lets you send web pages from your phone to your TV to view on the Chrome Browse5.

Picture-in-picture
Surf the web, watch TV, or do both at the same time. Follow your fantasy teams online while you watch the games live, or update your Facebook status while viewing a movie2. You can even resize the box and move it to any corner.

1.2 GHz dual-core processor
Webpages, videos and apps load quickly with the power of a 1.2 GHz dual-core processor. 

Control your TV with your phone
Transform your iPhone, Android phone or tablet into a versatile remote control with a full QWERTY keyboard. Just download the free Media Remote app if you’re looking for one less remote on the coffee table. The app also lets you send web pages from your phone to your TV to view on the Chrome Browser5.




Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 
How does the Sony Internet Player with Google TV deliver me media? Choose what you want exactly when you want it—comedy or drama, live or streaming, right now or Friday night. Get your favorite apps, 
browse the web, and devour the content you crave, from broadcast shows to cat videos and everything in between.2 So I can use Google to search for information, entertainment content, apps, 
or cable TV the same I would for websites? Yes. With Google search built right into your TV, find any and all of the content you crave. Instantly. Simply use the keyboard on your 
remote control to search for keywords and decide if you want to watch related content on Youtube, live TV, or saved shows ready to watch instantly.2 Can I also browse the Web? Explore the web—including many of your favorite sites—on a grand scale, thanks to a built-in Google Chrome browser. Chrome browser is designed for 
speed, simplicity and efficiency. It launches and loads pages quickly, has a Flash Media Player for videos, and lets you search directly from the address box.2 How do you set it up? With the Sony Internet Player with Google TV, set-up is simple. Just plug your cable box into the Sony Google TV, 
then connect it to your TV. From there, get live shows, movies, and online content without switching inputs or rearranging cords. 1. Check Dish Network website for compatibility. (www.dishnetwork.com/googletv)

2. Broadband speed of at least 2.5 Mbps recommended (10 Mbps for HD). Content subject to change and may require fees. Wireless connectivity requires an 802.11 home network (802.11n recommended).

3. Up to $45 value is based on redemption of 3 new release features from Google Play beginning 7/1/12 through 7/15/14. Titles are subject to change without prior notice.
For full Terms and Conditions please go to www.sony.com/PlayMovieOffer.

4. Not all products supported.

5. Application must be downloaded from the iTunes app store or Google Play. Check Google Play from your device for compatibility. Requires devices connected to the same wireless home network.

6. Voice-activation requires a Bluetooth headset or NSG-MR7U Remote Control to function.

7. Movies are redeemed in digital format.

8. Google TV services are subject to change or termination without notice.

9. Monthly subscription is required

10. Fees may apply.

11. Check Google Play store on your device for availability and compatibility.

12. Not all space is available for consumer storage.

A full-browsing experience on your TV with Google Chrome
Access thousands of Android apps at Google Play Store2
